LanguageData.SkywardMindhexSpaceBattle: {0_nameDef} has completed {RITUAL_definite} ritual with impressive power and precision! The mindhex has hit a massive spacefleet, causing madness in ship captains! A full-on space battle will soon occur!
LanguageData.SkywardMindhexShuttleCrash: {0_nameDef} has completed {RITUAL_definite} ritual; the mindhex has hit a shuttle in orbit. They will crash shortly, as its pilot struggles to keep themself anchored in reality.
